title: Software Developer - Consulting Internship Summer 2024
purpose: To support software development projects through requirement gathering, project planning, system documentation, and application testing.
duties_responsibilities: Perform routine assignments in support of the department and Firm strategic plan
Work closely with project managers, developers, and stakeholders to understand and design business system's functional and nonfunctional requirements
Support application testing and application users post implementation
Contribute to reporting and custom developed IT projects
Participate in software testing including Quality Assurance and Quality Control
Communicate any obstacles or items of concern to supervisor
Comply with professional and Firm requirements
Attend training sessions or meetings as required
Maintain a positive attitude and be receptive to feedback
required_qualifications: Working towards a Bachelor's or Masters of Science degree in Computer Science, Information Systems and Decision Sciences, Accounting, Finance or a related field
Direct experience or education related to Agile software development cycles, software development, design and/or testing preferred
Experience or education related to project management, process management preferred
Experience or education related to technical writing or requirements gathering preferred
Experience with JIRA, Confluence, or related IT Project Management programs preferred
Working knowledge of Scrum or other Agile methodologies
Able to work in a dynamic, fast-paced, innovative, and continuously changing environment
Excellent communication skills in business and technical environments
company_info: EisnerAmper is one of the largest accounting, tax, and business advisory firms, with nearly 4,000 employees and more than 350 partners across the world. Our clients are enterprises as diverse as sophisticated financial institutions and start-ups, global public firms and middle-market companies, as well as high net worth individuals, family offices, not-for-profit organizations, and entrepreneurial ventures across a variety of industries. We have offices in the United Kingdom, Israel, India, the Cayman Islands, Singapore, and Ireland.
